translations.sign_up_for_free: Sign up for free to start listening.
translations.sign_up_email: Sign up with your email address
translations.email_error_invalid: This email is invalid. Make sure it's written like example@email.com
translations.email_error_exists: This email is already connected to an account. Log in.
translations.email_error_empty: You need to enter your email.
translations.confirm_error_empty: You need to confirm your email.
translations.password_error_empty: You need to enter a password.
translations.displayname_error_empty: Enter a name for your profile.
translations.day_error_invalid: Enter a valid day of the month.
translations.year_error_age: Sorry, you don't meet Spotify's age requirements.
translations.terms_conditions_notice: By clicking on Sign up, you agree to Spotify's Terms and Conditions of Use.
translations.privacy_policy_notice: To learn more about how Spotify collects, uses, shares and protects your personal data please read Spotify's Privacy Policy.
translations.service_messages_notice: We may occasionally send you service-based messages.
translations.terms_conditions_explicit: I agree to the Spotify Terms and Conditions of Use.
translations.terms_conditions_implicit: By clicking on sign-up, you agree to Spotify's Terms and Conditions of Use.
translations.terms_conditions_implicit_uk: Spotify is a personalised service. By clicking on sign-up, you agree to Spotify's Terms and Conditions of Use.
translations.privacy_policy_explicit: I agree to the Spotify Privacy Policy.
translations.privacy_policy_implicit: By clicking on sign-up, you agree to the Spotify Privacy Policy.
translations.privacy_policy_non: To learn more about how Spotify collects, uses, shares and protects your personal data, please see Spotify's Privacy Policy.
translations.terms_conditions_pp_explicit: I agree to the Spotify Terms and Conditions of Use and Privacy Policy.
translations.terms_conditions_pp_implicit: By clicking on sign-up, you agree to the Spotify Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.
translations.terms_conditions_pp_agree: I agree to the Spotify terms & conditions and Privacy Policy.
translations.terms_conditions_pp_agree_de: I hereby agree to the Terms of Service and consent to the collection, processing and use of my personal data, as described in more detail in the Privacy Statement.
translations.terms_conditions_error: Please accept the terms and conditions to continue.
translations.third_party_agree: Share my registration data with Spotify's content providers for marketing purposes.
translations.third_party_agree_eu: Share my registration data with Spotify's content providers for marketing purposes. Note that your data may be transferred to a country outside of the EEA as described in our privacy policy.
translations.third_party_agree_de: Share my registration data with Spotify's content providers for marketing purposes. Note that your data may be transferred to a country outside of the EEA as described in our privacy policy.
translations.marketing_opt_in_text_agree: Please send me Spotify marketing messages.
translations.marketing_opt_in_text_notice: We may send you emails with news or promotions occasionally. Go to your Email notifications page to control the messages we send.
translations.marketing_messages_opt_in: Please send me news and offers from Spotify
translations.marketing_messages_opt_out: I would prefer not to receive marketing messages from Spotify
translations.error_missing_fields: Please fill in all of the required fields.
translations.error_too_many_attempts: Something went wrong. Try again later.
translations.error_timeout: This form has expired. Please reload the page and try again.
translations.error_unknown_try_again: Something went wrong. Have another go?
translations.error_unknown: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again or check out our help area.
translations.error_try_again_later: Something went wrong. Try again later.
translations.browser_not_supported: Sorry, your browser isn't supported. Please try with a newer browser.
translations.terms_conditions_agree_kr: Spotify terms and conditions of use
translations.personal_info_agree_kr: Collection and use of required personal information
translations.personal_info_agree_error: Please accept the collection of required personal information to continue.
translations.third_party_agree_kr: Third party data provision
translations.privacy_policy_notice_kr: For more detailed information on the data we will process about you please refer to our privacy policy.
